pr_title: Adding SampleNode stats and cost rule.

timeline.message: Adding SampleNode stats and cost rule.
Adding SampleNode stats and cost rule.

timeline.body: extend SimpleStatsRule instead so the stats get normalized
timeline.bodyText: extend SimpleStatsRule instead so the stats get normalized
timeline.bodyHTML: extend SimpleStatsRule instead so the stats get normalized
timeline.author: rschlussel

replies.bodyText: Why do some rules need normalization but others don't?
replies.author: aweisberg

replies.bodyText: Thanks @rschlussel  for your help and review. I have amended the change now. I have similar question as @aweisberg . Can you help in terms of when normalization is required?
replies.author: ssaumitra

replies.bodyText:
If you're only adjusting one field from stats but not others, you'd want to normalize. Normalization makes it so that e.g. if you set the row count less than the distinct value count, we reduce the distinct value count to match.
Almost all rules extend SimpleStatsRule right now. I think it would be quite reasonable to require it for every rule, or even to do it in the PlanNodeStatsEstimate builder or constructor, but that's beyond the scope here.
replies.author: rschlussel

replies.bodyText: IMO implicit non-obvious knowledge like this should be documented somewhere. We can't rely on always having the right experts around to safely make changes to this code.
replies.author: aweisberg

replies.bodyText: Agreed, though I think instead we should make it happen automatically by default, so that it's impossible to mess it up.
replies.author: rschlussel

timeline.message: Adding SampleNode stats and cost rule.
